msg: Fix an inconsistency in the RA get-location-segments fallback code.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix a buglet in svn_repos_node_location_segments() which could cause
items to be reported with a truncated history.
(nls_history_func): Expect a new baton type, and signal bailout if we cross
revision of an object, leave the lower bounds on the revision search
range wide open and just let the callback function signal early

author: dlr
msg: Fix issue #2994, avoiding revision filtering when merging into a WC
using a different repository as the merge source.
(calculate_remaining_ranges): Add a new SAME_REPOS parameter, and
use it to conditionalize calls to filter_reflected_revisions() and
filter_merged_revisions().  When the WC doesn't correspond to the
repository used as the merge source, merge all requested revisions.

author: lgo
msg: New test: switch to urls (files, directories) containing spaces in their names.
Test is currently failing, so mark as XFail.
(test_list): run the new test, with XFail wrapper.
